about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Hello! I'm Hongru Wu
paragraphs: I'm a passionate developer and researcher with a strong background in computer science. I love creating elegant solutions to complex problems and am always eager to learn new technologies.
My interests span across artificial intelligence, machine learning, web development, and software engineering. I believe in the power of technology to make a positive impact on the world.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Leading development of innovative solutions and mentoring junior developers. Focus on AI/ML integration and scalable web applications.

experience.title: Master's Degree in Computer Science
experience.description: Specialized in artificial intelligence and machine learning. Published research papers on deep learning applications.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Developed full-stack web applications using modern technologies. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.

experience.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
experience.description: Foundation in computer science fundamentals, algorithms, and software engineering. Graduated with honors.

projects.title: AI-Powered Application
projects.description: A cutting-edge application leveraging machine learning to solve real-world problems.

projects.title: Web Platform
projects.description: A modern web platform with real-time features and responsive design.

projects.title: Mobile App
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile application with intuitive user experience.

awards.title: Best Innovation Award
awards.description: Recognized for outstanding innovation in AI applications

awards.title: Hackathon Winner
awards.description: First place in national coding competition

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's Connect!
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities, collaborations, or just having a friendly chat. Feel free to reach out!
